definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: The Distributor is authorized to sub-contract and assign the distribution and sales of the Products to sub-contractors of Fangyuan Group.
sentences.chinese: 發行人已授權轉包及銷售此產品給方園集團的轉包商。

sentences.english: The publisher of the book went further though.
sentences.chinese: 然而，此書的發行人做得更絕。

sentences.english: Domestic issuers are not subject to this requirement.
sentences.chinese: 此爲本國發行人所無之規定。

sentences.english: Q11. Can a foreign issuer apply as a technology-based enterprise for a primary OTC listing?
sentences.chinese: 外國發行人可否以科技事業身分申請股票第一上櫃？

sentences.english: Then tell the publisher or copyright holder of the specific GPL-covered program.
sentences.chinese: 然後告訴那個GPL程序的發行人或版權持有者。

sentences.english: The trial involved, publisher of the New York Weekly Journal.
sentences.chinese: 這些努力包括，紐約週刊的發行人，曾格。

sentences.english: A group of underwriters that agrees to purchase a new issue of stock from the issuer for sale to the public.
sentences.chinese: 同意向發行人購買新股並向公衆出售的承銷商。

sentences.english: Q5. What kind of foreign issuer can apply for a primary OTC listing?
sentences.chinese: 何種外國發行人可以申請股票第一上櫃？

sentences.english: Q10. Can a foreign issuer apply as an investment holding company for a primary OTC listing?
sentences.chinese: 外國發行人可否以投資控股公司申請股票第一上櫃？

sentences.english: A given dollar amount is to be paid each year by the issuer to the investor.
sentences.chinese: 發行人每年向投資人支付一個給定的貨幣額。

sentences.english: Issuer will not store Passphrase in plaintext.
sentences.chinese: 發行人將不會儲存在密碼明文。

sentences.english: For instance, it could allow these investors to influence the ratings, as could the issuers.
sentences.chinese: 比方說，投資者如此便可以如發行人那樣影響評級。
